## Setup code chunk 

```{r Setup}
#| message: false
#| warning: false
library(tidyverse)
post_meal_data <- read_csv2(here::here("data/post-meal-insulin.csv"))
```

## Showing the data

```{r}
post_meal_data
```

```{r}
glimpse(post_meal_data)
```

```{r}
ggplot(post_meal_data, aes(x = BMI)) +
  geom_histogram()
```

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "Distribution of BMI"
#| label: fig-bmi-histo
ggplot(post_meal_data, aes(x = BMI)) +
  geom_histogram()
```

@fig-bmi-histo

## Excercise: discrete plots

```{r}
#| fig-cap: "Distribution of glykemi"
#| label: fig-glykemi-bar
ggplot(post_meal_data, aes(x = glykemi)) +
  geom_bar()
```

See @fig-glykemi-bar for a cool plot!
